name: Oopstacle Course
description:
Jump, Dodge, Wait, Run. All of that in 30 seconds until the signal base tour.

In this short simple 2D Platformer, try and complete a row of 10 levels as fast as you can within 30 seconds, if the run out of time... OOPS, Game Over, have to restart. 

Seems short, right ?

Then you have power-ups to help you. Musical notes will grant you special abilities, such as an air jump or a speed boost, to help you complete a level.

But watch out ! 

Don't expect to finish every level too easily, in fact it's going to be quite difficult, and pretty messy with the multitude of obstacles in your way such as spikes covering the land, exploding orbs and flying enemies all want you dead in your traces to reach the end.

Have I mentionned that the signal tour can be blocked off by a laser barrier as the only way to remove it is with a key ? OOPS, my bad.

You'll need to be careful in each levels if you want to get to the finish line, or else... OOPS, you died.


WARNING : There is no save data, so if you run the game again, all collectibles like stars will be reset.

P.S. : This is my very first finished game, and it's supposed to be a training project in the first place, so don't expect this game to be off high quality, i'm a game developper beginner. I haven't made many games before this one, but I still hope it is good enough. Enjoy.
